  RELEASE NOTES:
  
  CLS released this game 1 hour ago - but their rip fucked up the textures
  and also left out the DirectPlay registry entry. Additionally this rip
  is even smaller and has the music. Mabye CLS should start finding a good 
  use of their people on T3s - like testing their releases before actually
  releasing them.


  This is the most complete Rally game to date and it contains months of
  driving as you progress through the classes. We praised the realism of  
  Colin McRae Rally when it arrived on the scene more than 12 months ago, 
  but this knocks it for six in every department. It is the rally sim to 
  have.

  FEATURES:
  
  - 4 modes of play including Simulation
    An accurate simulation of the classic stages of the Mobil 1 BRC plus     
    Arcade, Single and Time Trial
 
  - Photo-realistic scenarios
   'Real life' feel made possible by filming and photographing every stage
 
  - 36 accurately modeled stages
    Over 400 miles of classic stages from the Mobil 1 British Rally
    Championship
  
  - 23 highly detailed rally cars
    Accurately modeled cars using hundreds of photographs for reference
 
  - True multi-route environment
    Freedom to drive practically anywhere on the landscape
 
  - Advanced car physics
    Using independent suspension, enhanced crash sequences and interaction
 
  - Multiple viewpoints including 3D dashboard
    Animated Dashboard viewpoint (all cars individually supported)
 
  - Environment interaction with cars
    Mud and snow buildup and detachment/deformation/damage of car parts
 
  - Comprehensive multi-player options
    2 Player Split Screen, 4 player alternate and network
 
  - Co-driver and real pace notes
    Selectable audible co-drivers (featuring World Rally Champion Derek
    Ringer) and/or visible pace notes
 
  - 360-degree multi-directional movement
    Full 360-degree, panoramic movement adding to the 'real world'
    experience
 
  - Interactive scenery objects
    Interaction with both static and moveable objects
  
  - Object and texture animation
    Windmill, people, animals and water to name just a few
  
  - Special effects
    Light flare, haze, sparks, reflections, smoke, plus others
 
  - Radical A.I. implementation
    New levels of sophistication for computer car artificial intelligence
 
  - Enhanced replay mode
    With editing, camera set-up and additional views
 
  - Revised incidental Screens
    New design with dynamic 3D icons and Mobil 1 BRC theme
 
  - Advanced sound
    Individual engine sounds from all the rally cars at the BRC plus
    environmental spot effects
  
  - Comprehensive hardware support
    3D, AGP, 24 bit, Pentium III, AMD K6-2, A3D, EAX and control devices

  INSTALLATION:

  Unzip and unace. Run the Setup.bat (this will take some time as jpgs and 
  mp3s have to be decompressed. It will take less time than downloading 4 
  disks on a modem though :o Make sure you keep the window in foregound, 
  else it will slow down). Start the game with Ral.exe. Enjoy!
  
  RIPPED:
  
  Only intro movies and a completely unnecessary slideshow of car-still-
  images had to go - everything else is there.

  Thanks to FLT for the iso.
